1.question: What is the name of this painting?
1.content: {The Mona Lisa} is a {half-lenght} {oil portrait} by {Italian} artist {Leonardo Da Vinci}

2.question: Who is this famous snake-headed lady?
2.content: In {Greek} mythology, {Medusa} was one of {three} monstrous {Gorgons}. She is also called {Gorgo}
